title: Gisele Bundchen gets into the Halloween spirit at the pumpkin patch with her daughter
text:
Halloween is just five days away.

And Gisele Bundchen was gearing up for the spooky night with a visit to the pumpkin patch with her daughter Vivian, six, on Friday night.

The beautiful blonde, 39, seemed to be having a blast at the farm as she shared in just a few of her adventures with her Instagram followers.

She's having the best fun: Gisele Budchen couldn't stop laughing as she wrangled a giant pumpkin on Friday evening and shared the snap on Instagram

'The kids are so excited to make their Halloween lanterns and all I can think about is delicious pumpkins seeds and muffins!' she shared, honestly.

Gisele, a former supermodel, actress and environmentalist who hails from Brazil, looked like she was having the best fun as she laughed while wrangling a giant pumpkin.

Vivian enjoyed a ride in the cart that was loaded down with at least four of the golden veggies.

The little cutie wore a pink sweatshirt with grey arms and shoulders, blue marl leggings and sneakers.

Rubbing noses: Vivian, six, enjoyed her ride in the cart. Gisele captioned the snap, 'The kids are so excited to make Halloween lanterns and all I can think about is delicious pumpkins seeds and muffins!'

A blonde like her mom, her tresses were done up in ponytails on either side of her head.

Gisele bent down to rub noses with Vivian, leaving her blonde way hair to cascade down.

The beauty looked chic in an off-white, oversized, knitted cardigan that she wore over a creamy knitted sweater and white skinny jeans tucked into suede bootees.

Family: Gisele and Tom Brady have been married for more than a decade and share two children, in addition to his son with ex Bridget Moynahan, John Edward; seen in July

White is possibly not the best color for a dirty pumpkin patch, but the smiling celebrity got away with it.

There didn't seem to be any sign of her husband Tom Brady, 42, or their son Ben, nine.

She and the New England Patriots quarterback began dating in late 2006 after a mutual friend introduced them on a blind date.

The couple married on February 26, 2009 in a small ceremony at St. Monica Catholic Church in Santa Monica and had second ceremony in Costa Rica in April 2009.
description: The beautiful blonde, 39, seemed to be having a blast at the farm as she shared in just a few of her adventures with her Instagram followers.
